extendedInfo.description: The Wren Play-Fi application utilizes DTS's wireless audio technology for Android. Stream your favorite tunes from your Android phone or tablet to one or more Wren V5PF speakers.  A great listening experience is just a touch away, thanks to this handy app. Choose a Play-Fi enabled speaker, choose a song, and your favorite tunes are streaming directly from your Android phone or tablet to every Play-Fi speaker in your home.The app offers a wide range of built-in streaming options: Use Pandora, play anything from your music library, enjoy songs from DLNA servers on your home network, or choose among thousands of AM/FM/Internet Radio stations and podcasts (ESPN, Radio Disney, BBC to name a few).Please note that the Wren Play-Fi app is companion software to the Wren V5PF speaker.  It is also compatible with the Phorus PS1 Speaker, Phorus PR1 Receiver, and other products enabled with Play-Fi technology. It is not intended as a stand-alone audio player.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works well with my  Google Nexus S
reviews.author: Erica Jones
